body.name: Beautiful Tiered Tray Decor Set for Valentines Day - Interchangeable All Season Decorations Bundle Incl. Easter, Spring & More - Modern Farmhouse Centerpiece for Home & Kitchen Decor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 2 mins
features: Ultimate Tiered Tray Decor Set: Endless ways to decorate your home with a ladder, easel, banners, blankets, a square, a hexagon & a round frame w/ a gnome - each with 6 seasonal designs to effortlessly style & customize. Prints inside frames; tray not incl.!

Mix & Match To Add Seasonal Charm To Your Home: Absolutely gorgeous! Simply swap mini signs, colorful banners, blankets and the velcro-attached gnomes’ hat & hands to showcase your seasonal decor style - from Valentine’s Day & Easter to Christmas decoration

Charming All-Year Round Decor in Farmhouse Style: Atmospheric & homey - modern farmhouse decor by KIBAGA! The set delights with its vintage white pieces, rustic wooden elements and pretty prints with lovely designs - a beautiful centerpiece all year round

Beautiful Design & Premium Craftsmanship: Whether as easter decoration, spring tier tray decor or as summer & fall room decor, made from top-notch materials, the decor set adds a fresh twist to your seasonal farmhouse home decor for years to come

A Fantastic Gift For Any Interior Enthusiast: Lovers of seasonal decor will be super pumped by this heartfelt housewarming, birthday or wedding gift! It’s a wonderful way to create that extra level of coziness in your home, making a house a happy home
body.description: Ultimate Tiered Tray Decor Bundle by KIBAGA: Elevate Your Home Decor And Make Each Season Feel Special! NOTE: A tiered tray is NOT included in this set. The prints for the frames are all stored inside the frames. Your all-in-one tiered stand decor set - seasonal decorating made easy! With the farmhouse style decor set you are well prepared to make your seasonal and holiday decoration stand out. Enjoy the numerous options of customizing and effortlessly styling your tiered tray thanks to the large set of decor elements. The practical design makes it super easy to mix & match the mini signs, gnomes, banned and blankets to your taste & season. All pieces are crafted from premium materials so you can fully enjoy the seasonal decor for many years to come. Create a festive Christmas look with traditional colors, showcase a brief, yet super cute Valentine’s Day design followed by an atmospheric Easter decor. All before you swap the decor ready for Easter time. Summer’s up next and your tiered tray decor set offers just the right pieces for an exciting summer theme. Cozy fall vibes call for showcasing those characteristic fall colors. Unique, charming and absolutely cute - the tiered tray decor set features: x1 squared frame (3.9x3.9x0.75”) with 6 seasonal designs // x1 hexagon frame (3.4x3.4x0.7”) with 6 seasonal designs // x1 round frame (7.1x0.1) with a velcro-attached gnome, including 6 different colored gnome hats, 6 different colored gnome hands // x6 banner designs with strings // x6 tiny blankets with different colors // 1x Ladder // 1x Easel //// Bring seasonal charm to your home with KIBAGAs’ tiered tray decor set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
reviews.reviewText: This set will need to be put together each time you change it out. Rather cheaply made as well so I’ll be returning it myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really pretty and worth it
reviews.reviewText: I love this decoration set because its versatile and I can change it depending on the season. I will be using this set at my coffee bar that I am creating. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't Come With Instructions
reviews.reviewText: The concept of this is really good: several holidays all in one with pictures, gnome hats and hands, banners and blankets ready to be swapped out for each one. The gnome's hat and holiday hands are easy to swap out using the Velcro backing and the pictures are behind each other in the frames and are easy to replace as well. HOWEVER, it doesn't come with any instructions. I didn't know what to do with the piece of material till I saw the drawing on the front of the box, there are a bunch of small and medium sized round Velcro tabs that are sticky backed that I have no idea what to do with. The banner pieces come with a rope for each and you have to string each piece onto it, but there's no directions about how you're supposed to attach it to your "cake" tower. It does come with a Thank You card that tells you how to get help with your product but I'd rather the instructions be part of the package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good set but smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: Well worth the price but smaller than expected

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set as a gift for a friend. She absolutely loves that she can customize it with the different seasons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!! Perfect for what I needed
reviews.reviewText: This is so cute and versatile. Exactly what I wanted in my kitchen for a simple holiday decoration. I used a $10 tiered tray from Aldi, and this was on sale for $9. Every holiday covered for under $20!
